title: verify_metric_ingestion_and_retrieval
description: Test the ingestion of metrics via POST /api/v1/core/metrics/ and retrieval via GET /api/v1/core/metrics/ with query parameters for filtering by name and source.

title: verify_log_listing_functionality
description: Test the retrieval of logs via GET /api/v1/core/logs/ ensuring logs are returned correctly and support any expected filtering or pagination.

title: verify_promql_query_execution
description: Test the execution of PromQL-like queries via POST /api/v1/queriers/execute/ with valid and invalid query payloads and verify correct query results or error handling.

title: verify_anomaly_detection_listing
description: Test the retrieval of detected anomalies via GET /api/v1/insights/anomalies/ ensuring anomalies are listed correctly and response format is as expected.

title: verify_alert_creation_and_listing
description: Test the creation of alerts via POST /api/v1/notification/alerts/ and retrieval of alerts via GET /api/v1/notification/alerts/ verifying multi-channel dispatch configurations.

title: verify_dashboard_template_management
description: Test the listing of dashboard templates via GET /api/v1/dashboards/templates/ and creation/import of templates via POST /api/v1/dashboards/templates/ ensuring templates are managed correctly.

title: verify_report_generation_functionality
description: Test the generation of analytics reports via POST /api/v1/analytics/reports/generate/ with different report types and formats (PDF, CSV) and verify correct report content and format.
